sentences.english: Rajani was Mr. M's granddaughter, the child of his oldest married daughter.
sentences.chinese: 拉贾尼是M先生长女的女儿，他的外孙女。

sentences.english: "Why so?" asked the eldest daughter of the Melyukovs.
sentences.chinese: “那是为什么？”梅柳科娃的长女问道。

sentences.english: If the king had no male heir, he inherited by the eldest daughter or their heirs.
sentences.chinese: 如果国王没有男性后嗣，便由长女或其后嗣继承。

sentences.english: I was the oldest, and my brothers and sisters were my best teachers.
sentences.chinese: 我是家中长女，而弟弟妹妹就是我最好的老师。

sentences.english: She was witnessing her firstborn child die a slow death from HIV.
sentences.chinese: 她正在看着她的长女因为HIV慢慢死去。

sentences.english: Did her a Di mother send person to have never called to come over to call eldest daughter two?
sentences.chinese: 她一个嫡母派人去叫了长女两次，都没叫过来？

sentences.english: The second kind is Frightfulness Type.
The eldest, Bushra, is said to be influential and authoritative.
sentences.chinese: 中的长女，布沙拉，被认为是影响力和权威性。

sentences.english: And the eldest sister is already married.
sentences.chinese: 长子和长女都已经成家。

sentences.english: Mother decided to deed the house over to the eldest daughter before she died.
sentences.chinese: 母亲决定在逝世之前立遗嘱把房子转让给长女。

sentences.english: She is the eldest daughter of Izanagi.
sentences.chinese: 天照是伊邪那岐的长女。

sentences.english: All the firstborn of your sons you shall redeem.
sentences.chinese: 所有的长女的儿子，您应赎回。

sentences.english: This house is entailed on the eldest daughter.
sentences.chinese: 这幢房子限定由长女来继承。

sentences.english: Leslie, my oldest, turned 21 last year.
sentences.chinese: 莱斯利，我的长女，去年已经21岁。

definition: Zhangzi county in Shanxi 山西[Shan1 xi1]
